summary: A collection of unit tests that instantiate and exercise the various 2‑dimensional UNet building blocks (down‑sampling, up‑sampling, attention, cross‑attention, skip connections, and ResNet variants) to verify their forward passes produce tensors with the expected shapes and types.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the UNet components used in diffusion models, preventing regressions and guaranteeing that model pipelines built from these blocks function as intended.
